label: Genomics
description: The study of an organism's entire genome.

label: Metabolomics
description: The identification, quantification, and characterization of the small molecule metabolites in the metabolome (i.e., the set of all small molecule metabolites found in a specific cell, organ, or organism).

label: Proteomics
description: The study of proteins, their structures, and their functions, namely the study of the proteome.

label: Transcriptomics
description: The study of the transcription, i.e., the expression levels of mRNAs in a given organism, tissue, etc. (under a specific set of conditions).
